title: Context-Enhanced Multi-View Trajectory Representation Learning: Bridging the Gap through Self-Supervised Models
details: T Qian, J Li, Y Chen, G Cong, T Sun, F Wang, Y Xu - arXiv preprint arXiv:2410.13196, 2024
abstract: Modeling trajectory data with generic-purpose dense representations has become a prevalent paradigm for various downstream applications, such as trajectory classification, travel time estimation and similarity computation. However, existing …
